name: Drawn: The Painted Tower
summary:
Enter the world of Drawn, and unravel the secrets of the Painted Tower. Overcome challenging puzzles on your quest to save Iris. A curse has locked each floor of the tower, and only the most creative adventurer can find a way through. Enter lush painted worlds and meet fantastic characters who will help you…and sometimes try to stop you, on your quest through the dream world of The Painted Tower. 
 
Beware! Darkness approaches the tower. Can you save her in time?
storyline:
Enter the world of Drawn, and unravel the secrets of the Painted Tower. Overcome challenging puzzles on your quest to save Iris. A curse has locked each floor of the tower, and only the most creative adventurer can find a way through. Enter lush painted worlds and meet fantastic characters who will help you…and sometimes try to stop you, on your quest through the dream world of The Painted Tower. 
 
Beware! Darkness approaches the tower. Can you save her in time?

esrb.synopsis: Players enter a series of enchanted paintings to save a kidnapped child in this puzzle-adventure game. Players must solve riddles, interact with characters, collect clues, and decipher puzzles (e.g., seek-and-find) to complete the valiant quest. The game includes mostly implied violence: dragons threaten; skeletons and shrunken heads suggest an ominous fate; butterflies, bees, and dragonflies are cooked in a potion. The dialogue may touch on mild themes of conflict as well; for example, the aforementioned skeleton comments, 'you can only ever make one fatal mistake' and another character declares that 'punishment . . . will be delivered without mercy.'

pegi.synopsis:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 7 years and over only.
It contains: Pictures or sounds likely to be scary to young children
